article.description: Lincoln Davis and Nick Garth each scored 18 points with Davis adding nine assists to help lead Lamar past Delaware State 77-66 on Saturday.
article.headline: Lamar holds off Delaware State, 77-66
article.story: DOVER, Del. -- Lincoln Davis and Nick Garth each scored 18 points with Davis adding nine assists to help lead Lamar past Delaware State 77-66 on Saturday. Dontavious Sears added 10 points for the Cardinals (2-1), who shot 45.1 percent from the field and hit 8 of 19 from the 3-point line. Lamar opened the game on an 11-3 run, capped off by a Dorian Chatman fast break layup, and took a 41-23 halftime lead. Delaware State (0-4) battled back in the second half, cutting the lead to six (59-53) after a Kavon Waller jumper with 5:25 left in the game. But a Sears 3-pointer pushed the lead back to nine on the next possession and two Kevin Booze free throws two minutes later recaptured a double digit lead for the Cardinals and put the game out of reach. Joseph Lewis and David Mallory each scored 13 for Delaware State.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
